meaningMnemonic: Into your <radical>mouth</radical> the <radical>leader</radical> shot an <radical>arrow</radical> with an attached <radical>hook</radical> so that they'd be able to see into your <kanji>throat</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: From your <kanji>throat</kanji> you hear a voice. Not yours, but one you recognize. It's <reading>こう</reading>いち! What's that rascal doing down in your throat?
